author: Tennis 365
title: Ground News - Why Jannik Sinner could be among the biggest losers as Miami’s sunshine is washed out
text: Jannik Sinner was among the big names set to start his campaign at the Miami Open on Friday, but a deluge of rain has hugely delayed the schedule in Florida. Australian Open champion Sinner came into the Miami event expressing some doubts over his fitness after he hurt his elbow and appeared to have some tightness in his calf during his defeat against Summary by Tennis 365 Carlos Alcaraz in Indian Wells last weekend. With those fitness questions in mind, Sinner would… 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right [] Tennis 365 Why Jannik Sinner could be among the biggest losers as Miami’s sunshine is washed out Jannik Sinner was among the big names set to start his campaign at the Miami Open on Friday, but a deluge of rain has hugely delayed the schedule in Florida.
